projects.title: Data Governance & Standardization
projects.problem: Siloed global marketing teams produced unstructured data, compromising BI visibility into $20M annual spend.
actions: Established a global UTM governance framework by configuring UTM.io with regex-based validation and integrating SQL-driven reporting in Domo to enforce consistent campaign tagging standards.
Partnered with product and marketing leaders to map workflows, define data standards, and roll out governance processes across teams.
Delivered training and managed change for 200+ stakeholders using Jira and Smartsheet to drive adoption and compliance.

outcomes.description: Improved data quality in marketing reports.
Enabled accurate oversight of $20M in marketing investments.
Achieved 150% increase in platform adoption and trust in BI analytics.
Led onboarding and change management across global teams.

projects.title: Analytics Engagement Model
projects.problem: The global marketing analytics team lacked a formal intake process, creating operational bottlenecks.
actions: Designed and automated a new intake workflow in Jira and Smartsheet, including SLA tracking and automated routing rules.
Scoped incoming requests, authored user stories, and defined acceptance criteria to ensure efficient downstream development.
Introduced Kanban Agile delivery, driving stand-ups, backlog prioritization, and dependency management.

outcomes.description: Cut approval lifecycle from 2 weeks to 3 days.
Freed engineering resources to focus on high-impact work.

projects.title: AI Call Intelligence Platform Enhancement
projects.problem: Call classification models were underperforming at 65% accuracy, limiting trust in analytics.
actions: Configured and managed Invoca’s NLP call-intelligence platform, aligning model parameters and pipelines with business needs.
Partnered with Invoca Data Science to optimize training datasets, adjust thresholds, and enhance feature extraction.
Conducted monthly confusion matrix analysis and SQL-driven precision/recall tracking in Domo, presenting optimization insights to senior leadership.

outcomes.description: Raised model accuracy from 65% to 90%.
Surfaced ~1,000 additional qualified leads annually.
Improved visibility of marketing contribution to pipeline.

projects.title: Analytics Operational Leadership
projects.problem: A 40-person analytics team struggled with conflicting priorities and project delays.
actions: Created an integrated Smartsheet–Jira Kanban system with roadmap and Gantt views to track dependencies and deliverables.
Implemented a weighted prioritization framework scoring initiatives by urgency, impact, and effort.
Led biweekly alignment sessions with executive sponsors to tie deliverables to the $20M marketing budget.

outcomes.description: Increased throughput of the analytics team.
Reduced average request cycle time by one week.
Streamlined intake and delivery for 250+ annual requests.
Reduced approval cycles by 95%.

projects.title: Confluence SSO Migration
projects.problem: Disjointed user experience required 200+ stakeholders to manage separate Jira and Confluence logins.
actions: Led migration of Confluence to Microsoft AD SSO by mapping workflows, permissions, and authentication requirements.
Coordinated IT security and identity teams to validate SAML assertions and align AD groups with Confluence permissions.
Executed phased cutover and delivered onboarding for 200+ stakeholders with zero disruption.

outcomes.description: Completed migration with no user disruption.
Transitioned over 200 users to unified SSO login.

projects.title: Automated Call Routing System
projects.problem: Inbound callers faced delays connecting to correct representatives.
actions: Designed an Invoca API-based routing system that matched caller location via keypad input or caller ID to the nearest branch.
Partnered with data engineering to build lookup tables and real-time routing automation.

outcomes.description: Reduced prompts required to connect to reps by 90%.
Improved customer experience for over 600,000 annual calls.

projects.title: Global Tax Automation Program
projects.problem: Manual and outdated Oracle EBTax module created inefficiencies in tax compliance for $1B in annual spend.
actions: Spearheaded deployment of Thomson Reuters OneSource SaaS across 30 markets, integrating APIs with Oracle EBS R12.
Led requirements workshops, authored BRDs/FRDs, and configured tax engines and rulesets.
Managed SDLC phases from UAT to post-deployment support for 20+ cross-functional team members.

outcomes.description: Delivered $4M in savings through automation.
Enabled compliance across 30+ countries.

projects.title: Expense & Compliance Automation
projects.problem: On-premise Oracle expense module lacked automation and compliance checks.
actions: Migrated expense management to SAP Concur integrated with Oracle Purchasing and Finance via batch processes.
Configured Concur with rules-based workflows and mapped integrations to Oracle PO/AP/GL/AR.
Defined UAT scripts, managed QA cycles, and ensured SOX-compliant reconciliations.

outcomes.description: Automated 99% of compliance checks.
Improved on-time reporting by 20%.
Onboarded 8,000+ employees globally.

projects.title: Host-to-Host Payment Automation
projects.problem: Manual payment transmissions delayed processing of $1B in spend.
actions: Architected XML-based host-to-host payment transmissions over secure SFTP with multinational banks.
Built failover mechanisms to retry failed validations and maintain >99% on-time payments.
Documented integrations with BRDs, TDDs, and Confluence blueprints, and led UAT validation.

outcomes.description: Achieved near-perfect payment completion rate.
Automated global payments for $1B annual spend.

projects.title: Data-Driven Operational Management
projects.problem: Procure-to-Pay team needed better prioritization and visibility into enhancements.
actions: Developed SQL queries to analyze service-level gaps, request volumes, and technical debt hotspots.
Built Tableau dashboards to track project health and prioritize enhancements vs. remediation.
Led prioritization sessions with stakeholders and partnered with DevOps for sequencing fixes.

outcomes.description: Boosted operational efficiency 25%.
Balanced enhancements with long-term stability.

projects.title: Centralized Project Portfolio Management
projects.problem: Over 120 projects lacked centralized tracking, causing conflicts and delays.
actions: Built a Smartsheet portfolio tracker with Gantt charts and resource dashboards as a single source of truth.
Automated reporting and led weekly stakeholder sessions with 20+ participants to manage dependencies.
Provided concise progress updates to senior leadership, surfacing risks early.

outcomes.description: Achieved 90% on-time project completion.
Saved 20 hours of manual reporting per week.
Resolved ~100 resource bottlenecks annually.
